dataset.title: Culture Collection of Microalgae and Zygnematophyceae Collection Hamburg (MZCH-SVCK)

abstract.para: The Culture Collection of Microalgae and Zygnematophyceae Collection Hamburg (MZCH-SVCK) contains over 550 living strains. Focus of the collection are Zygnematophyceae, especially Desmidiaceae, with multiple isolates collected from different continents. The Zygnematophyceae collection, formerly SVCK (Engels & Mix 1980, Mix 1973) serves as reference strain collection for studies on evolution of streptophytes, ecophysiological adaptations in microalgae and the influence of climate change.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License.

gbif.citation: Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin. Culture Collection of Microalgae and Zygnematophyceae Collection Hamburg (MZCH-SVCK). Occurrence dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/vjkfej accessed via GBIF.org on 2023-04-13.
